title: International Monetary Fund email accounts hacked in cyberattack
description: The International Monetary Fund (IMF) disclosed a cyber incident on Friday after unknown attackers breached 11 IMF email accounts earlier this year. [...]

title: McDonald's: Global outage was caused by "configuration change"
description: McDonald's has blamed a third-party service provider's configuration change, not a cyberattack, for the global outage that forced many of its fast-food restaurants to close. [...]

title: US moves to recover $2.3 million from "pig butchers" on Binance
description: The U.S. Department of Justice (DoJ) is recovering $2.3 million worth of cryptocurrency linked to a "pig butchering" fraud scheme that victimized at least 37 people across the United States. [...]

title: PornHub now also blocks Texas over age verification laws
description: PornHub has now added Texas to its blocklist, preventing users in the state from accessing its site in protest of age verification laws. [...]

title: Microsoft announces Office LTSC 2024 preview starting next month
description: Microsoft announced that Office LTSC 2024, the next Office LTSC release, will enter a commercial preview phase starting next month and will be generally available later this year. [...]

title: Admin of major stolen account marketplace gets 42 months in prison
description: Moldovan national Sandu Boris Diaconu has been sentenced to 42 months in prison for operating E-Root, a major online marketplace that sold access to hacked computers worldwide. [...]

title: Former telecom manager admits to doing SIM swaps for $1,000
description: A former manager at a telecommunications company in New Jersey pleaded guilty to conspiracy charges for accepting money to perform unauthorized SIM swaps that enabled an accomplice to hack customer accounts. [...]

title: McDonald's IT systems outage impacts restaurants worldwide
description: McDonald's restaurants are suffering global IT outages that prevent employees from taking orders and accepting payments, causing some stores to close for the day. [...]
